description: SOP for handling top-up related customer issues

symptoms: User transferred via BCA but balance not updated
scenarios.root_cause: BCA virtual account matching delay or incorrect VA number used
scenarios.resolution: Verify VA number used. Check BCA reconciliation. If confirmed, manual credit may be needed. Escalate to ops.
scenarios.script_en: Please share your proof of transfer. We'll verify the BCA virtual account number and reconcile. BCA direct transfers may take up to 1x24 hours to reflect.

scenarios.scenario: BCA name not unique — top-up rejected
scenarios.root_cause: BCA requires unique name matching, common names may fail validation
scenarios.resolution: Check user's full name against BCA records. May need to update KYC name or use alternative top-up method.
scenarios.script_en: BCA requires exact name matching. Please ensure the name on your BCA account matches your Pluang KYC name. If the issue persists, try using an alternative top-up method.

scenarios.root_cause: User error — duplicate transfer or wrong amount
scenarios.resolution: Verify transaction details. Process refund via BCA direct channel. Refund timeline: 3-7 business days.
scenarios.script_en: We've received your refund request. BCA direct refunds take 3-7 business days to process. You'll receive a notification once completed.

scenarios.scenario: GoPay top-up failed — balance deducted but not credited
scenarios.resolution: Check GoPay transaction status. If confirmed deducted, manual credit needed. Escalate to ops with GoPay transaction ID.
scenarios.script_en: We can see the GoPay deduction. There may be a processing delay. If your Pluang balance isn't updated within 1 hour, please share the GoPay transaction ID and we'll investigate.

scenarios.scenario: GoPay top-up — user redirected but didn't complete
scenarios.root_cause: User didn't complete the payment flow in GoPay app
scenarios.resolution: Explain that the payment wasn't completed. No charge was made. Ask user to retry.
scenarios.script_en: It looks like the GoPay payment wasn't completed. No charge was made to your GoPay account. Please try the top-up again and complete the payment in the GoPay app.

symptoms: Couldn't pay at Alfamart in time
scenarios.resolution: Explain expiry. Ask user to generate new payment code. No charge for expired codes.
scenarios.script_en: Alfamart payment codes expire after 24 hours. Please generate a new code in the app and complete the payment at your nearest Alfamart.

scenarios.scenario: Alfamart top-up paid but not reflected
scenarios.root_cause: Alfamart reconciliation delay (can take up to 2-3 hours)
scenarios.resolution: Check Alfamart reconciliation status. Usually resolves within 2-3 hours. Keep receipt as proof.
scenarios.script_en: Alfamart top-ups can take up to 2-3 hours to reflect in your Pluang balance. Please keep your receipt. If the balance isn't updated after 3 hours, please contact us with your receipt photo.

scenarios.root_cause: QRIS payment expired, network error, or insufficient balance in e-wallet
scenarios.resolution: Ask user to check e-wallet balance and retry. QRIS codes expire after 30 minutes.
scenarios.script_en: QRIS payment codes are valid for 30 minutes. Please ensure sufficient balance in your e-wallet and try scanning the QR code again.

scenarios.root_cause: Daily/monthly top-up limit reached or single transaction limit exceeded
scenarios.resolution: Explain top-up limits by method. Suggest splitting or using different method.
scenarios.script_en: Top-up limits vary by method. Bank transfer: up to IDR 100,000,000/day. E-wallet: varies by provider. Please try a smaller amount or a different payment method.
